label: Market Intelligence
description: Analyze market opportunities and recommend product categories based on growth trends, demand signals, and competitive landscape.

defaultOutputs.name: Segment
defaultOutputs.tooltip: Product segment or category identified from the market analysis.

defaultOutputs.name: Product Growth (Supply)
defaultOutputs.tooltip: Year-over-year growth rate in product launches/supply.

defaultOutputs.name: Review Growth (Demand)
defaultOutputs.tooltip: Year-over-year growth rate in consumer reviews/demand signals.

defaultOutputs.name: Recommended Category
defaultOutputs.tooltip: Recommended product category positioning based on market analysis.

defaultOutputs.name: Key Competing Brands
defaultOutputs.tooltip: List of main competing brands in this segment, useful for competitive benchmarking (e.g. "Aesop, Neom Organics, The Nue Co., Saje Wellness").

defaultOutputs.name: Main Price Range (USD)
defaultOutputs.tooltip: Typical price range for products in this segment in US dollars, including average price (e.g. "30 – 90 (Avg ~55)", "20 – 60 (Avg ~35)").

defaultOutputs.name: 3 Key Reasons for Recommendation
defaultOutputs.tooltip: Three key strategic reasons why this category is recommended, including market opportunity, consumer trends, and competitive advantages.

configSchema.label: Market Query
configSchema.placeholder: Enter your product launch question or market research query...
configSchema.tooltip:
Describe your product idea, target market, or ask a market intelligence question. Example: "I want to launch a honey-based sweetness & taste modulation syrup on Amazon. Which category would be the best fit?"

You can enter text directly or upload a file (TXT, CSV) containing your query.
